## Loading the data

```{r}
here::i_am("R-project-patent.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
```

```{r}
## Loading patent data
patent <- vroom(here("patent.tsv"))
```

```{r}
## Loading key indicator data
key_indicator <- vroom(here("key_indicator.tsv"))
```

```{r}
## Loading education data
education <- vroom(here("education.tsv"))
```
